home.heroSubtitle: With 20 years of experience, we develop premium residential, commercial, and mixed-use projects.

home.ctaTitle: Contact Us for Your Dream Space
home.ctaSubtitle: Our expert team is ready to offer you the best solution.
home.whyUsQualityDesc: Construction with the highest quality standards using sustainable materials.
home.whyUsTimeDesc: Guaranteed on-time delivery by adhering to project schedules.
home.whyUsTrustDesc: Transparent communication and reliable business partnership at every stage.
home.testimonialsSubtitle: Experiences from families living in our projects
home.testimonial1Quote: We've been living in Aryap Mest for 3 years. The best company at balancing quality craftsmanship and fair pricing.
home.testimonial2Quote: We bought a home in Camlica 144. Their commitment to the delivery date made us very happy.
home.testimonial3Quote: We have our office at Ozone Aryap. The central location and modern design improved our productivity.
home.testimonial4Quote: At Zeydanlar Location, both our home and workplace are in the same place. The mixed-use concept is amazing.
home.testimonial5Quote: The underfloor heating in Aryap Konfor cut our winter bills in half. Highly recommend.
home.testimonial6Quote: We were kept informed at every stage from purchase to delivery. Truly a reliable company.
home.showcaseSubtitle: Scroll to explore our projects in Eskisehir and Bursa
home.processSubtitle: We turn your dream space into reality in four steps
home.step1Desc: We listen to your needs and determine the best solution together.
home.step2Desc: Our expert architects design your dream space.
home.step3Desc: On-time construction process with the highest quality standards.
home.step4Desc: We hand over your keys and help you start living in your new home.

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: The address of trust in construction for 20 years
about.storyText: Aryap Construction & Real Estate was founded in Eskisehir in 2005. Since its establishment, our company has been guided by the principles of quality, trust, and innovation, becoming one of the leading construction companies in Eskisehir and Bursa for residential, commercial, and mixed-use projects.
about.storyText2: With our strong engineering infrastructure, experienced team, and vision for modern technology, we aim for the highest standards in every project.
about.valueQualityDesc: Pursuit of excellence in every detail
